alert.note: Alert for Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 2:42PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN WASHINGTON... SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHEAST WARREN...NORTHERN WARREN...AND NORTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 241 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Day Center to West Glens Falls and moving northeast at 10 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Lake Luzerne Campground and Lake Luzerne-Hadley around 245 PM EST. Fort Edward around 255 PM EST. West Glens Falls around 300 PM EST. Glens Falls around 305 PM EST. Glens Falls North around 310 PM EST. Hudson Falls around 315 PM EST. Lake George Village around 320 PM EST. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 17S and 22. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Washington
